articles.description: The COVID-19 pandemic continues to take a toll on U.S. mall owners.
articles.content: Bankruptcies are extremely rare in the REIT sector. After all, REITs are required to keep the bulk of their assets in physical properties, or debt backed by real estate. Most real estate tends to app… [+4721 chars]
